How to install the Sketchup SVG Outline Plugin

Basically all you want to do is take the files out of the zip file *sketchup-svg-outlines-plugin-0.3.2.zip*:
 * svgTemplateMakerReg.rb
 * readme.txt
 * gpl-3.0-standalone.html
 * FlightsOfIdeas
  * flightsOfIdeasStyle.css
  * svgOkDialog.html
  * svgTemplate.rb
  * svgTemplateDialog.html
  * templateMaker.rb
  * Images
   * Create.png
   * dragonfly_50.png
   * FlightsOfIdeas.png

..and put these files into your SketchUp 6 directory (preserving the directory structure) - on a windows machine this is normally something like _C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Google SketchUp 6\Plugins_ and on Mac OS X this should be _Hard Drive/Library/Application Support/Google SketchUp 6/SketchUp/Plugins_

See the [http://sketchup.google.com/download/rubyscripts.html official Google page] for more information with regard to installing plugins
